com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.sample

Class SPUserExitSample

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.sample.SPUserExitSample
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitIF

    public class SPUserExitSample
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitIF
    Every user exit class has to implements this interface User exit class may be called from multiple threads and is responsible for synchronization. User exit class have to provide default constructor (it is instantiated using Class.forName(...).newInstance() )

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.ReplicationEventPublisherIF p_Publisher)
          throws com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitException
        This method is called by the Transformation Server engine in order to initialize the user exit instance Any user exit initialization can be done here. In particular, user exit should subscribe to replication events, for which it wants to get notification. To do so, the subscribeForEvent() method should be called on the p_Publisher parameter (possibly, several times)
        Specified by:
        init in interface com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitIF
        Parameters:
        p_Publisher - is to be used to subscribe for replication events The user exit program should not make any use of the p_Publisher except during this method call. If user exit stores this reference and calls its methods in future, the exception will be thrown.
        Throws:
        com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitException - can be thrown in case of error

      • processReplicationEvent

        public boolean processReplicationEvent(com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.ReplicationEventIF p_Event)
                                throws com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitException
        This method is called by the Transformation Server engine for every replication event of any type that this user exit instance subscribed for. Here the information for the event can be retrieved and data record(s) contained in the event can be modified. The method should return a boolean value that signifies for Transformation Server engine whether to proceed with the default action for this event or not. Specifically, for BEFORE_CLEAR, BEFORE_INSERT, BEFORE_DELETE and BEFORE_UPDATE events, if the method returns 'false', the Transformation Server will not perform table truncation, insert, delete or update. In other cases the returned value is ignored.
        Specified by:
        processReplicationEvent in interface com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitIF
        Parameters:
        p_Event - replication event
        Returns:
        whether to proceed with the default Transformation Server action
        Throws:
        com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitException - can be thrown in case of error

      • finish

        public void finish()
        This method should implement any cleanup required for the user exit
        Specified by:
        finish in interface com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitIF
